column2: Have you ever interacted with an AI-based customer service tool (e.g., chatbot, voice assistant)?
column3: How often do you interact with AI customer service tools?
column4: In which of the following service areas have you experienced AI-based customer service?
column5: AI customer service tools help me find the information I need efficiently.
column6: AI systems are able to provide accurate answers to my questions.
column7: AI tools make it easier to solve simple service-related issues.
column8: I am usually satisfied with the results provided by AI customer service systems.
column9: AI customer service tools improve my overall experience with the company.
column10: Using AI customer service tools saves me time.
column11: AI systems are available whenever I need assistance.
column12: I find it easy to access AI-based support on company websites or apps.
column13: The process of interacting with an AI chatbot or assistant is straightforward.
column14: AI-based customer service helps me resolve issues without waiting in line for human support.
column15: I believe AI customer service tools provide reliable information.
column16: I trust AI chatbots to handle my customer queries properly.
column17: I feel confident that AI systems respond to my requests accurately.
column18: I consider AI-based customer service tools credible.
column19: I believe AI assistants are designed to serve customers’ best interests.
column20: I find it easy to communicate my needs when using AI customer service tools.
column21: AI systems usually understand my questions correctly.
column22: Interacting with AI systems feels smooth and efficient.
column23: AI tools guide me clearly through the support process.
column24: AI-based customer service meets my expectations most of the time.
column25: AI customer service is suitable for handling simple inquiries.
column26: I prefer using AI tools when I need quick answers.
column27: I am comfortable relying on AI systems for common service tasks.
column28: I believe human agents should focus on complex issues, while AI handles routine ones.
column29: I would be willing to use AI customer service again in the future.
column30: I would recommend AI-based customer support to others.
column31: I believe companies benefit from using AI alongside human customer service teams.
column32: I would prefer AI-based support over human support for routine tasks.
column33: I would recommend companies that use AI for customer service.
column34: I will likely continue using AI-based support in the future.
